name: Light The Way (itch) (critter17)
description:
Navigate through the dark tunnels using light switches!

Xbox controller supported.

W, S, A, D or Arrow Keys (Xbox - Left thumbstick) to move.

Space (Xbox - A) to jump.

E (Xbox - X) to interact.

Submission to 8 bits to Infinity ~ Platformer Week Game Jam.

Game Design, Programming, and Art is done by me.

Sources

https://www.madfireongames.com/single-post/MARIO-STYLE-JUMP-2D-PLATFORMER-UNITY3...
